description: 10-day solo luxury itinerary in Laos, balancing top-tier hotels with unique high-end local experiences in Vientiane and Luang Prabang. Seamless transfers, guided tours, luxury spa and wellness, fine dining, and curated cultural activities. Budget prioritized through selective hotel choices and planned activities for a personalized premium experience.

activities: Arrive in Vientiane, private airport transfer to Settha Palace Hotel, relax and enjoy luxury amenities.
itinerary.transportation: Private airport transfers in Vientiane and Luang Prabang
itinerary.notes: Balance luxury stays by combining top-tier and high-end boutique accommodations to fit budget.

activities: Guided city tour: Pha That Luang, Patuxai, Buddha Park. Evening fine-dining experience.
